verbs.description: [V: ruckus] [ARGM-LOC: on air india flight] involves pilots cabin crew the sight of airline cabin crews trying to mollify enraged passengers has become all too common but a recent air india flight added a twist when crew members mid - flight started punching each other new delhi sajed mumtaz pakistan ajs walia purser khanna flag carrier chhavi jaggarwal assault cabin crew harassment bhavna tiwari
